characteristics.name: Investigative Approach
characteristics.description: Lee Fang consistently appears to be thorough and meticulous in their investigative work.

options.description: Analyzes every detail before drawing conclusions.
Engages with sources and experts to build a narrative.

characteristics.name: Tone
characteristics.description: Lee Fang's content often has a critical tone, but also allows for nuance and ambiguity.

options.description: Examines topics from multiple angles, avoiding oversimplification.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Lee Fang tends to communicate in a clear and concise manner.

options.description: Uses storytelling techniques to engage audiences.

characteristics.name: Interest in Current Events
characteristics.description: Lee Fang's content frequently covers pressing issues in international news.

options.description: Prioritizes coverage of significant global events.
Covers a wide range of topics, including local and niche areas.

characteristics.name: Investigative Style
characteristics.description: Lee Fang often uses primary sources and expert insights to support their claims.

options.description: Conducts thorough research, analyzing multiple data points.
Considers the broader context of a story before presenting findings.

characteristics.name: Critical Thinking
characteristics.description: Lee Fang appears to critically evaluate information and arguments.

options.description: Questioning the status quo and challenging assumptions.
Considering practical implications of ideas and policies.

characteristics.name: Emotional Tone
characteristics.description: Lee Fang's content often has a serious, somber tone.

options.description: Approaches topics with gravity and respect.
Acknowledges the human impact of issues, expressing compassion and understanding.

characteristics.name: Social Dynamics
characteristics.description: Lee Fang frequently engages in public debates and discussions.

options.description: Asserts their opinions with confidence and conviction.
Seeks input from others, considering diverse perspectives.
